titles: Mr. Hales's treatise of schism examined and censured by Thomas Long ... ; to which are added, Mr. Baxter's arguments for conformity, wherein the most material passages of the treatise of schism are answered.
author: Long, Thomas, 1621-1707.
Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691. Mr. Baxter's arguments for conformity against separation.
notes: Added t.p. on p. [151]: Mr. Baxter's Arguments for conformity against separation.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
keywords: Hales, John, 1584-1656. --  Tract concerning schisme and schismaticks.
